>> robot voice: Melrose Place
gets subversive.
>> This one really surprised me.
Do you remember the TV show Melrose Place?
It was a spinoff of 90210.

>> Yeah, it was, like,
a prime-time soap opera

but this is at a time when
that prime-time real estate,
this is back when you would have millions

of people watching,

You could maybe wade

>> Than just a bunch of used condoms.

Where do you get that exactly?
